# The `ConcurrentIRCompiler` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A thread-safe version of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simplecompiler">SimpleCompiler</a>.

This class creates a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simplecompiler">SimpleCompiler</a> instance for each compile.

Definition at line 82 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/compileutils-h">CompileUtils.h</a>.
